name: eqtr2
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))

stmt.origin: sylanb(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c2), wceq(c1, c0))
stmt.pretty: sylanb(c0 = c1, c0 = c2, c1 = c2, c1 = c0)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))
-| wb(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c1, c0))
-| wi(wa(wceq(c1, c0), wceq(c0, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))
-| wb(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c1, c0))
-| wi(wa(wceq(c1, c0), wceq(c0, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))

|- wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))
-| wi(wa(wceq(c1, c0), wceq(c0, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wceq(c1, c0), wceq(c0, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))

comment: A transitive law for class equality. (Contributed by NM, 20-May-2005.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 25-May-2011.)
